titleInfo.title: Within-family environment and cross-fostering stress affect behaviour and physiology in wild cavies (Cavia aperea)

mods.abstract: Data and R-script to the publication Within-family environment and cross-fostering stress affect behaviour and physiology in wild cavies (Cavia aperea) to appear in Frontiers in Psychology
